text._text:
Altra Survey Terms & Conditions

Between 9/23/20 on or after 9:00 AM MST and 9/29/20 at 11:59 PM MST, complete the survey.  The content of your responses will not affect the availability of promo code provided that such content is not obscene, hateful or otherwise objectionable/inappropriate as determined by Altra in its sole discretion.   

Altra will send you a promo code redeemable for 15% off  the purchase of regularly priced item(s) at www.altrarunning.com. To redeem, enter promo code at checkout and click “Apply A Promo Code.”

By accepting promo code, you represent and warrant that you completed the survey truthfully, honestly and to the best of your ability and agree to advise Altra upon request from time to time and without compensation whether you still hold the opinions set forth in your survey responses.

Code valid until 10/31/20 at 11:59 p.m. EST and is valid for one-time use only. Not valid at any 3rd party retailer of Altra products.  15% price reduction is pre-tax and excludes expedited shipping charges.  This offer cannot be combined with other promo codes, coupons, offers or discounts. Offer excludes discounted items. 

Promo code is good only for original recipient of same (i.e., consumer who completed survey.) We reserve the right to verify identity of consumer before honoring promo code; this and all decisions of Altra are final and binding. All purchases are subject to terms and conditions of www.altrarunning.com. We are not responsible if the promo code is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without your permission or for technological failure/error/malfunction of any kind. Remaining balance of merchandise purchase must be paid using another form of payment. This offer cannot be redeemed for cash or applied as payment to any account. Promo code is not transferable and not to be republished. No price adjustment allowed on previous purchases, product returns/exchanges or purchases made without use of the promo code. No variance from these terms and conditions allowed except as required by law.  Void where prohibited, taxed or restricted. Offer subject to change at any time without notice.
